content: little buds by annie baker anniebakerdesigns com little buds is a reversible assigned pooling design ideal for semi-solid or tonal yarns with a small section of high contrast color you will knit the main color in garter stitch and contrast color in bud stitch to create a cute little scarf with random pops of color little buds is knit diagonally and the size is adjustable the look of your scarf will depend on the yarn you use sample scarf shown on us size 12 dress form enjoy materials fingering weight yarn 525 meters / 570 yards for small scarf as shown more for a larger scarf use assigned pooling yarn or select a yarn with approximately 10% to 20% section of high contrast color 3 00mm us 2 5 / uk 11 knitting needles 1 stitch marker gauge 26 stitches in garter stitch = 4 inches measurements approximate before blocking 54 across neck edge 12 neck edge to center point after blocking 60 across neck edge 13 neck edge to center point notes  yarn used in sample scarf has approximately 15% contrast  stitch marker is used to help you keep track of row worked  scarf is knit diagonally back and forth  allow buds to position themselves on either side of your knitting stitches together kfb = knit into front and back of next stitch kfbfb = knit into front back front back of next stitch st s = stitch es stitches used garter stitch using main color knit every row bud stitch using contrast color create buds as follows kfbfb into next stitch using left needle lift first three bud stitches worked one at a time starting with third bud stitch over last bud stitch knit enough buds to use up most of the contrast color on the next row knit bud stitches through back loops work buds anywhere on either side of your knitting except three stitches at either end of row start buds after these stitches instructions please read notes and stitches used sections before casting on with a long stretch of main color section of yarn cast on 4 stitches proceed to row 1 stitch count shown at end of each set up row row 1 sl1 k to last st kfb 5 row 2 kfb k to end 6 row 3 sl1 k2tog k to last st kfb 6 row 4 kfb k to end 7 row 5 sl1 k2tog k to last st kfb 7 row 6 kfb k2 place sm k to end 8 proceed to row 7 remember to make buds
